about_the_game:
Calm3D is an immersive zen environment to feel calm when you need to. Experience peace through the 360-degree soundscapes and listen to music and guided meditations designed to help you feel more relaxed.

About the game.


Calm3D elevates the relaxation experience with VR-ready immersive environments for breathing exercises, meditations and to regulate your emotions. Scripts designed by psychotherapists to soothe and relax accompanied by music specially composed to create a sensory calming environment.

This is your personal recluse to take a break, recharge, and restore your soul. Tired from work or having a short break between games? Hop into the Calm3D zen garden and experience our visually pleasing garden scenes with lush greenery and a majestic magical space-sky.

Mindfulness is a habit that takes time and effort and may yield little results for some. Our immersive zen garden is a cross of mindfulness and relaxation in a game-like environment. Pick up the art of breathing and meditating in the ease and comfort of the zen garden and allow the breath to take you on a deeply relaxing and personal journey towards peace and recovery, without the effort of consistently trying to create an ideal space and time to meditate.

Float in the clouds with our VR feature or relax as you watch on screen the water and grass textures moving in the wind. Our highly detailed artwork is the effort of a hardworking team of creatives who had the passion to bring mindfulness and relaxation to stressed-out or tired-out gamers.

Support our game, and add Calm3D to your wishlist!

Features


  • Realistic and detailed immersive environments for breathing, meditating, and feeling calm through our on-rails ride through the clouds.
  • Customizable options for ambient sound, audio guide, and different breathing exercises.
  • VR-ready for a fully immersive experience.
  • Every piece of music is designed to soothe and stimulate a relaxing sensory experience.
